author: Paul O'Flynn
title: No stretch to stay fit with workouts only a click away
description: The Covid-19 pandemic has led to an explosion in the popularity of online gym classes and home workouts. RTÉ's Paul O'Flynn took the plunge from the comfort of his living room.
content:
It's Monday lunchtime and ordinarily time for me to take a dip in my local pool. However, like the rest of us, I’m stuck at home, left high and dry by the outbreak of Covid-19.
I’ve been eating like it’s Christmas too, so it’s time I started moving my backsi… [+3386 chars]
